short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A quick and relaxing game of Tic-Tac-Toe can be refresher of your mind during busy times

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple and engaging Tic-Tac-Toe game designed to provide quick entertainment and mental refreshment for users during short breaks or waiting periods by xlsdeal.com.

The users who plays the game, either as Player-X or Player-O.

left mouse click for Player-X and Right Mouse click for Player-O.

Players can set their names (optional) or proceed with default names ("Player X" and "Player O").
The system saves these names for score tracking and personalization.


Gameplay:
The game board is displayed with 9 cells in a 3x3 grid.
Players take turns clicking on an empty cell to place their marker (X or O).
The system updates the game board and switches turns.


It will be Fun.

Thanks & Regards
